remarks: An element of a finite set of sequential integers up to the length of a word is an element of an extended finite set of sequential integers up to the length of a concatenation of this word with another word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Mar-2018.)
statement: elfzelfzccat $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) -> ( N e. ( 0 ... ( # ` A ) ) -> N e. ( 0 ... ( # ` ( A concat B ) ) ) ) ) $.
